dcterms:description: A dataset containing 131 liver training images from various clinical sites, including pathological cases such as hepatocellular carcinoma and colorectal cancer. The dataset is diverse, with images having varying resolutions and some containing metal artifacts.
dcterms:title: Medical Segmentation Decathlon (MSD)

dcterms:creator: B. Landman
Z. Xu
J.E. Iglesias
M. Styner
T.R. Langerak
A. Klein
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 30 images from the Beyond the Cranial Vault segmentation challenge, derived from various clinical scanners and containing abnormal cases.
dcterms:title: Beyond the Cranial Vault segmentation challenge

dcterms:creator: A.L. Simpson

B. Menze
dcterms:description: Supplementary data from the MSD challenge, consisting of 1277 images from various anatomical regions including lung, pancreas, hepatic vessel, spleen, and colon, used to investigate the impact of unlabeled data on learning strategies.
dcterms:title: Supplementary data from the MSD challenge
